title: Project Zed and Fiora action figures

embed.description: Silent, he follows. The shadow is within, where light will never touch. Pre-order the PROJECT: Zed action figure and receive an exclusive PROJECT: Zed collectible metal card. Please note: the images here show a 3D model of the figure. The appeara

body: Anyone know when and/or if they will be back in stock again???

replies.body: Just recieved mine. Brace yourself for lack luster packing and the possibility rito ran out of glue. The plastic window stuff was taped to the cardboard backing so it looks cheap in box and lack of packing dinged everything up except the figure. "Custom box is to protect figure only" is so true it hurts.
I Haven't seen it in stock at all and I cant pre-order it either, is it ever going to restock?

I'm not sure, I'm in the same boat as you are. I'll be checking in on that page a few times a week to get my order in next time they're in stock! :P

Let me know if you have any questions.

Now the question remains. When are they being shipped out to everyone who ordered them. I had ordered mine during the first batch and I have been waiting for it to come, please respond if you have obtained yours (Reply with a picture of your figure) or if you are also one of the people in my situation (Just simply say you haven't received it yet).     

{{champion:114}} {{champion:238}} .......soon..............hopefully.
